snippet: Alabama coach Nick Saban believes it's hard to blame players for skipping the bowl games when the playoffs have overshadowed most of them anyway....
lead_paragraph: Alabama coach Nick Saban believes it's hard to blame players for skipping the bowl games when the playoffs have overshadowed most of them anyway.

headline.main: Saban: Playoffs to Blame for Players Deciding to Skip Bowls
headline.print_headline: Saban: Playoffs to Blame for Players Deciding to Skip Bowls
